releaseNotes:
OAuth Support & Model Protection
• Preserve OAuth profiles (e.g. OpenAI Codex) during sync — never overwritten
• Stop overriding the active model on launch when set externally via OpenClaw CLI
• Add OpenAI Codex (OAuth) provider with browser-based sign-in flow
• Manage OAuth connections in OpenClaw Sync tab (view, remove, restore backups)
• Clean Slate now preserves OAuth profiles automatically
